updateLog: DAY ONE UPDATE - VARIOUS BUG FIXES
Fixed a glitch that would crash the engine when an custom arrow was pressed
Added the "Window" variable in the game which allows you to change the window's size, position, etc...
Fixed a glitch that caused the timer to always appear up screen, even if downscroll was enabled
Fixed a glitch that prevented notes from being missed
Parse errors will now show a message box instead of directly crash the engine.
